uem-deleteditemaccess.description: Lists UEM settings configured with deleted AD objects
uem-deleteditemaccess.query: MATCH p=(d:AD_Deleted)-[]->(a:UEM_Setting) WITH nodes(p) AS items UNWIND items as item RETURN DISTINCT item

uem-orphaneditemaccess.description: Lists UEM settings configured with orphaned objects
uem-orphaneditemaccess.query: MATCH p=(d:Orphaned)-[]->(a:UEM_Setting) WITH nodes(p) AS items UNWIND items as item RETURN DISTINCT item

ACTIVATES.description: UEM item is activate/enabled by item e.g. AD group
